description: This file defines a command-line interface (CLI) for managing workspaces in the 'agno' project. It uses the 'typer' library to create commands such as create, setup, up, down, patch, restart, config, and delete, which perform operations like creating, configuring, starting, stopping, updating, restarting, and deleting workspaces. The file imports various modules for logging, configuration, and workspace operations, and it registers CLI commands with associated options and help texts.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new workspace in the current directory using optional template or URL.

methods.name: setup
methods.description: Sets up a workspace from the current directory or specified path.

methods.name: up
methods.description: Creates resources for the active workspace, with optional resource filtering.

methods.name: down
methods.description: Deletes resources for the active workspace, with optional resource filtering.

methods.name: patch
methods.description: Updates resources for the active workspace, with optional resource filtering.

methods.name: restart
methods.description: Restarts resources for the active workspace by running down and then up.

methods.name: config
methods.description: Prints the current active workspace configuration.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the workspace record from the system (not physical files).
